law.catch_line: The Secretary of Budget and Management, after consultation with the Department, shall:...
law.text:
The Secretary of Budget and Management, after consultation with the Department, shall:
set schedules of classifications and salaries for all employees of the Department in accordance with the provisions of Division I of the State Personnel and Pensions Article; and
set minimum education or experience qualifications for:
all supervisors;
all assessor classifications; and
all clerical classifications in the Department.
